TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WorkflowMarkupSerializationException extends System.Exception

summary.span: The exception that is thrown by methods that perform serialization and deserialization.

span.span: The exception that is thrown by methods that perform serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 包括有關導致系統擲回例外狀況之程式行和資料行位置的資訊。 includes information about the line and column locations that caused the exception to be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用所有指定要序列化的例外狀況物件資料來設定 。 sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在還原序列化期間，從在資料流上傳輸的 重新組成例外狀況。During de-serialization, the exception is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream.
